name: not letter
content:
Validates an EU VA
T number
The VAT num
ber can be maximum of 20 char
s and it should start with two letters.
It doesn't al
low a space after the two country letters, but it allows a maximum of 3 non consecutive spaces in the middle. After a space, a minimum of 2 chars/digits are r
equired.
It can be improv
ed by stating all the ISO country codes at the beginning, but this is just a simple filter before validating through VIES (http://ec.euro
pa.eu/t
axation_customs/vies/).
Regex b3ased on http://
ec.europa.eu/taxation_customs/vies/faq.html#item_11
3%@#+iirewr
Examples are ficticious. Jus
t for testing purposes.
^&*&$*&
Correct:
--------
GB123 4567 89
ES123456789
ES123456789W
HU1234 56 789
PT1234 56 789 4545
pt1234 56 789 4545
NL999999999B99

Incorrect:
----------
IT 123456789
LT 123 456
7 89
PL123 456 
789 567 34
LV999999
9999923489023
author: hesk.
